div.p: What is the best book you've ever read and why?
The best books I've ever read are the trilogy "Fifty shades of grey". This book had been writted by E.L James.
I liked reading this book because it was very entertaining and he provided me some reflexions. I asked myself about the background of Christian Grey. Why was he so ruthless.
In deed i didn't get it at the beggining but throughout the book i had knew information and i better understood his attitude.
Moreover the love story between Christian and Anastasia were very enthralling.
If you ask me which book of the thrilogy I would choose it's the last because it's the embodiment of their life.
